short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free browser extension that shows verified American Made products on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop like a Patriot.

How it Works:
- Download the browser extension.

- The software is activated when you go on Amazon.

- Verified American Made products are in the top row. Below that section, users have the option to block all 'Made in China' products on the page. 

**we do not collect ANY personal data**
